Abigail Chen.description: having lunch at the Hobb Cafe with other Love Ville program participants (conversing about getting to know each other, sharing thoughts on art and beauty, and making plans to meet up for a drink and a walk around the village tonight, with a potential intimate encounter, and also scheduling a follow-up meeting for after tomorrow, between Abigail Chen and John Lin, with a palpable sense of mutual attraction and enthusiasm.) @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:piano

John Lin.description: having lunch with some of the other Love Ville program participants, engaging in lively conversation and enjoying getting to know them better (conversing about getting to know each other, sharing thoughts on art and beauty, and making plans to meet up for a drink and a walk around the village tonight, with a potential intimate encounter, and also scheduling a follow-up meeting for after tomorrow, between Abigail Chen and John Lin, with a palpable sense of mutual attraction and enthusiasm.) @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:refrigerator

Adam Smith.description: having lunch with the group at Hobb Cafe (conversing about their mutual interest in adventure, particularly skydiving, and making plans for their first date, which includes going skydiving and potentially exploring intimate experiences afterwards, with both parties expressing enthusiasm and agreement on spending the night together to unravel each other's desires.) @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:cafe customer seating
